Codeium AI Complete Review 2026

The Free GitHub Copilot Alternative

What is Codeium?

Codeium is a free AI-powered code completion tool that competes directly with GitHub Copilot. It offers similar features but at no cost, making it attractive for individual developers and small teams.

Key Features

  • Completely Free: Unlimited usage for individuals
  • Fast Autocomplete: Real-time code suggestions
  • 70+ Languages: Supports virtually any programming language
  • Chat Feature: Ask questions about your code
  • IDE Support: Works with VS Code, JetBrains, Vim, more

Codeium vs Copilot

✓

100% Free

No subscription fees for individuals

✓

More Languages

Supports 70+ languages vs Copilot's fewer

→

Slightly Different Quality

Good but may not match Copilot's polish
